inclusion.criterion: History of simple or complex partial epilepsy that has been documented or witnessed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: during a 12-week baseline phase, patient must have at least 12 partial seizures while maintaining therapeutic levels of antiepileptic drugs (AEDs)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: and have no more than one seizure-free interval of up to 3 weeks and none longer than 3 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients having solely generalized seizures or lacking documentation of partial epilepsy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: patients with generalized tonic-clonic seizures or other generalized epilepsies in the absence of an EEG consistent with partial epilepsy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: generalized seizures, which are defined by the EEG wave pattern
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: seizures that lack an abnormal pulsation pattern on EEG
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: females who are capable of having children
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required valium to cease seizure activity.
